attribute.name: host
attribute.description: The @host attribute allows to define the URL of the log server to feed.

attribute.name: appname
attribute.description: The @appname attribute allows to give a textual name to this application. This can be useful for humans to identify it on the server side.

attribute.name: heartbeat
attribute.description: The @heartbeat attribute allows determine at which rate (in seconds) the "alive" message will be sent to the log server.
